meetings.subject: Welcome Session
meetings.description: Learn about the iOS Lab and brainstorm our sessions for the semester. We create our Lab schedule based on your interests.
meetings.author: Phil Zakharchenko

meetings.subject: Mac Catalyst
meetings.description: Build fully functional Mac apps using your existing UIKit knowledge.
meetings.author: Phil Zakharchenko

meetings.subject: App Clips
meetings.description: Learn about the benefits of using App Clips, as well as how to build them.
meetings.author: Tanmoy Panigrahi

meetings.subject: Thinking Like a SwiftUI Engineer
meetings.description: Build your own modifiers, and take a deep dive into how SwiftUI works under the hood.
meetings.author: Maksim Tochilkin

meetings.subject: UI / UX Design
meetings.description: What's good UI design? Learn how to apply the principles of Human Interface Design to your new and existing apps.
meetings.author: Shahar Ben-Dor

meetings.subject: MetalKit
meetings.description: Learn how to take advantage of vast hardware capabilities on iOS and macOS.
meetings.author: Maksim Tochilkin
